bug.title: No More Than 1 Service Interval at a Time???
bug.description:
``` What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open Mileage Tracker 2. Negotiate to the "Service Intervals" screen 3. "Add Service Interval"
Expected behavior: I expect to be able to enter all of my upcoming services, like the next oil change AND the next State Inspection.
Actual behavior: Hello. I just installed your app, and it is very nice. To begin, I entered the information for my next oil change. No problem. Then I added a second service... my yearly State Inspection. But, when I entered the second one, it erased the first one. Any ideas???
Mileage version: Mileage 3.1.1 Android version: 4.1.2 Device: Droid Razar M
Please provide any additional information below.
```
Original issue reported on code.google.com by `david.ga...@gmail.com` on 15 May 2014 at 10:56
